structure.unit: B HOUSING, BUILDINGS, AND CONSTRUCTION - BUILDING CODE

law.catch_line: License required -- Qualifications -- Application -- Insurance -- Fee.

text.section: An individual shall not advertise or claim to be a home inspector and shall not conduct a home inspection for compensation without first obtaining a license as a home inspector.
An individual shall not advertise as, claim to be, or engage in or work at the trade of home inspection unless an owner or employee of that business is a licensed home inspector.
An individual applying for a license as a home inspector shall apply on a written or electronic form prescribed and provided by the board.

law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 8, effective June 8, 2011. -- Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 100, sec. 5, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 182, sec. 5, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 109, sec. 7, effective July 13, 2004.
